original_text: In the third year of King Belshazzar’s reign, I, Daniel, had a vision, after the one that had already appeared to me.
korean_text: 나 다니엘에게 처음에 나타난 환상 후 벨사살 왕 제삼년에 다시 한 환상이 나타나니라

sentences.original_text: In the third year of King Belshazzar's reign
after the one that had already appeared to me
